• UI Patterns – design a good UI, lot’s of examples.
  • Ruby vs. Scala – Yes, still.
  • Protovis – Javascript Graphs – Uses the Canvas element to create awesome cool looking graphs.
  • Auto-tabbing form input fields with JQuery – i think that the automatic tabbing in the Windows installer, when you enter the serial was the only thing i loved about windows… that and minesweeper.
  • Form inputs UI – JQuery – Nice and simple.
  • Essential UI Design suggestions – neat!
  • 3D preloaders generator – just like AjaxLoad, just in 3D.
  • Searchable, Downloadable Rails, Ruby and Gems API – Nice to have, but there are better tools.
  • 3 columns perfect layout – a 3 column layout in various mods, supports iPhone and valid.
